titleStmt.title: Pluto furens & vinctus, or, The raging devil bound a modern farse / Per Philocomicum.
titleStmt.author: Carr, William.
Fitton, Alexander, Sir, d. 1699.

notesStmt.note: Perhaps written with assistance of Sir Alexander Fitton; for discussion of authorship, see H.G. Platt in Modern language notes, XLV (1930), p. 507-510.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
